titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States v. Durenberger.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/13/1994--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States v. Durenberger, for the limited purpose of requesting the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit to give plenary consideration to the contentions of the United States and Senator Durenberger in regard to the separation of powers questions presented by the appeal.
